p: We searched five databases (MEDLINE [1966–2019], Embase [1980–2019], PsycINFO [1967–2019], CINAHL [1982–2019], and Web of Science [1970–2019]). The search strategy comprised terms for palliative care, hospice care, and end-of-life care as well as terms for pandemics and epidemics including specific named pandemics ( Appendix). We identified and screened the reference lists of relevant systematic reviews, government and nongovernmental organization reports, opinion pieces, and included articles.
